name: hexis.com.br
tag_list: analytics, instrumentation, calibration, quality-control, sanitation, food, beverage, pharmaceutical, chem-and-petrochem, pulp, paper, sugar, alcohol, hach, orbisphere, met-one, hydrolabott, eppendorf, 3m, agilent, charm, avantor, sartorius-biotech, mettl
overview: With a 28.000 items in the portfolio, Hexis is today the biggest instrumentation company in Brazil for Analytics, supporting markets such as Sanitation, Food, Beverage, Pharmaceutical, Chem and Petrochem, Pulp, Paper, Sugar, Alcohol and governmental companies and universities. Hexis is ISO certified (ISO 9001:2008 e ISO 17025:2005) to serve customers a top quality sales and post sales cycle. Hexis is nationwide in Brazil with its sales agents and technical teams serving a worthy support to customers. Hexis robust portfolio has product lines such as Hach, Orbisphere, Met One, Hydrolab/OTT, Eppendorf, 3M, Agilent, Charm, Avantor, Sartorius Biotech, Mettler Toledo, Satelit, Qhemis e Tec-Lab, Acumedia, Corning, Costar, Pirex, Nalgene, Boeco, Ethik e CPI.
